actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.
Reported to House from the Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce, H. Rept. 95-1163.
Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.
Measure failed of passage in House under suspension of rules, roll call #438 (190-188).

official_title: A bill to amend the Toxic Substances Control Act to increase the authorization of appropriations contained in such Act.

summary.text: Amends the Toxic Substances Control Act to increase from $16,200,000 to $50,000,000 the authorization of appropriations for fiscal year 1979 to the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency for carrying out specified provisions of such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Toxic Substances Control Act to increase the authorization of appropriations contained in such Act.
